amendment.description: Page 291, line 17, after the dollar amount, insert "(reduced by $100,000,000) (increased by $100,000,000)".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 109 printed in House Report 115-297 to provide $100 million for the COPS Hiring Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pascrell amendment (A109) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pascrell amendment (A109) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A109) offered by Mr. Pascrell.
